name: Countdown to Chaos (Prototype Build)
description:
CONTROLS

A, D - move left and right

W - jump (press again to double jump!)

ESC (during gameplay) - quit the game

GAME INFO

After spending ~3 months learning Unity and C# from scratch, with no prior knowledge, I entered the GMTK Game Jam 2022 - the theme of which was "Roll The Dice"!

Sadly, I didn't make the deadline for submissions, but I liked what I'd made and wanted to keep going with it.

In the game, you will have mere seconds of platformer normality before CHAOS takes hold, and a number of random events trigger, seeking either to aid or hinder your progress.

CURRENT GOAL

have fun, stay alive, check out the different effects and leave feedback.

GOAL ONCE COMPLETE

Collect as many coins as you can and reach the exit as quickly as possible to rack up the best score!
